title: Another Preview of Greater Albion's Next Release.....
content:
Greater Albion Typefounders have just put a fresh preview of our next release on our [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017000949/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). We're still hunting for a name-if you leave a suggestion and an e-mail address in a comment on the blog, we'll forward you a discount voucher code when it's released on MyFonts.Com.

Have a look and see what you think!
author: Rasendyll
